description: A newly discovered Linux malware dubbed 'DISGOMOJI' uses the novel approach of utilizing emojis to execute commands on infected devices in attacks on government agencies in India. [...]
title: New Linux malware is controlled through emojis sent from Discord

description: ASUS has released a new firmware update that addresses a vulnerability impacting seven router models that allow remote attackers to log in to devices. [...]
title: ASUS warns of critical remote authentication bypass on 7 routers

description: Microsoft has announced new cybersecurity enhancements for Outlook personal email accounts as part of its 'Secure Future Initiative,' including the deprecation of basic authentication (username + password) by September 16, 2024. [...]
title: Microsoft: New Outlook security changes coming to personal accounts
